item.title: EP 258 - The Bunnyman
item.itunes:title: The Bunnyman
item.description:
Today we start off season 6 with an acid fueled action scene, and then the story of one man in three locations but in one of them, he was already dead!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

‘Her eyes were completely black’: Va. family fends off naked woman who claimed to be the devil

https://www.wavy.com/news/her-eyes-were-completely-black-va-family-fends-off-naked-woman-who-claimed-to-be-the-devil/

 

‘It’s very hard to sleep’: Chesterfield family still traumatized 1 week after naked ‘devil’ breaks into home

https://www.wric.com/news/local-news/chesterfield-county/police-identify-naked-devil-who-broke-into-chesterfield-county-home-terrorized-family/

 

What's So Scary About Bunny Man Bridge?

https://www.liveabout.com/whats-so-scary-about-bunny-man-bridge-3299652

 

The Terrifying True Story Of The Bunnyman, Northern Virginia’s Most Gruesome Urban Legend

https://www.ranker.com/list/facts-about-the-bunnyman/laura-allan?ref=collections&l=2666765&collectionId=2139

 

The Bunny Man Unmasked: The Real Life Origins of an Urban Legend

https://research.fairfaxcounty.gov/local-history/bunnyman

 

The Clifton Bunny Man

http://www.castleofspirits.com/ghoststories/classic/clifton.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
